case.state: Tada! Here comes The Magical Girl of Love to save you all!
The more villains the merrier!... Wait, that's not how it works...
So many strange and new people are wandering into here! Hello!
Are we starting soon? Were you all waiting on ~target~? Come ooooon, I'm getting bored standing here!
A... Butterfly? Well, stranger monsters have existed...
In the name of love and justice, here I come!
I can handle this on my own!
It's already perfect enough!
This one isn't a hero!
One step from perfection, care to take it for me?
I'll save this trio, but the pair isn't strong enough!
A great pair, please!
Three for the queen!
I need a new and powerful trio!
Even if this card can stand on it's own, it shouldn't have to.
Only a smidgen of good. Thankfully I can remedy that!
This hand is evil, take it away!
I can do much better than this, take them all!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for me, please!

state.text: I'll be a lot stronger with ~cards.text~ more ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!

case.state: ~Cards.text~ more magical ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ please!
Face the might of a magical girl!
Do you all know about the worth and beauty of victory?
Call me if anything bad happens, okay? I know I can help!
Has anyone ever actually used magic to manipulate cards? Sounds like a waste of power to me...
Hopefully my hands won't do too well. True triumph comes only after hardship, you know!
Cheating... Bleck! Such a pitiful and pointless form of evil! Done only by helpless scum, as well.
Everything loves me, even cards!
I hope everyone else is having as much fun as I am, people always work harder when they're happy!
Monsters and card games... Both are hardly a threat to this magical girl!
Don't blame me if you lose, it's your misfortune, not mine.
Is there even such a thing as too good?
I'll play and fight till every last one of you lays nude! I've come too far to stop now!
Aha! I knew fate was with me!
Aww, I got a... No, no wait, this is good!... I think? Yes, it has to be!
Who won the last hand? It was me, right?
I never thought this kind of thing could be so... casual. It's really nice.
As a magical girl, I draw power directly from my own emotions! That means even without my staff, there's still enough love stuffed in me to kick all of your butts!
None of us magical girls are actually royalty, despite our titles. King acts like she is, though!
Putting my fate to chance actually isn't that bad! Thrilling, even!
Normally I'd wave away the uncertainty with a flick of my staff, but that hardly seems fair for the rest of you!
Arcana beats!
Hmm... I wonder what else there is to this place?
One of you could melt down to a goo monster before attacking us all... What? Thinking about that isn't weird, it's a real threat!
Hmm-mmm-hmm-hmmmm~.
Such a peaceful hand...
And with these cards I can-!... I can... Uh... What was I doing again?
Somebody told me to wear my heart on my sleeve once. This outfit doesn't have any, so I put it on my head instead!
Hmm... Well if I believe these cards are good, then they must be, since good is never wrong! Perfect!
This isn't quite the same as a regular fight, but what does that matter? I came here for something new!
Relying on luck... I never knew it could be so exciting!
Modesty's nice, but nudity has its own freedoms.
Without a bodice, my body feels so loose! Like I could stretch and bend within mere moments!
Oh, this isn't quite what I wanted... I guess brute force will have to make up the difference!
I hope everyone at the facility isn't too worried I'm not there to protect them.
There's this really nice lady back home who has chats with me every day!... At least, she used to... I haven't seen her at all recently, and the agents I ask never give a full answer.
Some villains start stealing, fighting, and causing chaos just because they don't have any money! Crazy, right? Is it really so hard to find a job?
Knight never let me experience this kind of game before... I can't imagine why, it seems perfectly safe!
Has anyone here got more than two eyes? Ocular excess is a sure sign of evil!... Plus, it's not like you'd need more than a pair to look at everything happening here.
Planning was never really my strong suit...
This game makes little sense, but that won't stop me from winning!
My oldest sister would love this game... She'd also probably know how to play cards.
Failure isn't an option, it's a setback!
A snake's snuck its way into my garden...
Hearts are the strongest suit, right?
Should I have let go of my staff so easily?... No, I'm sure someone magical as me can handle this on their own.
The power of cards is so fleeting... One moment you've the best hand ever and the next you're taking something off. Sort of like hubris, actually!
Maybe I should have believed in myself instead...
Well, almost nothing is irredeemable... Except that snake, and that scientist, and that murderer, and that puppy, and that tree, and that-...
Hey, um... None of you forgot about me, right?
...I can manage this.
Ah! The cards keep slipping from my fingers!
There's a whisper in my ear... It's trying to tell me something.
Oh well, I've averted worse disasters.
Some people like to call me really mean things even while under my protection! Their nicknames hardly make sense, how could you possibly hate someone so heroic!
I hate hate hate thieves! They're all cowardly pests who can't even muster enough courage to be squashed like the vermin they are!
T-there aren't any snakes here, right? I think I saw something moving on the ~background.surface~!
It's all suits and clipboards back home... This is the only chance and place I have to do something like this!
Someone told me my sisters are defending the facility as well, but I never get to see them... Apparently they've been feeling sick lately.
Does a bodice make your breasts smaller? It might squeeze a lot, but never enough to actually mold flesh, right?
Is the blade only enchanted to be sharper? Seems like a waste of magic, if that's the case. Why not spell it to shoot lasers instead? Or hearts! Hearts that shoot lasers!
Hmm? Is there something on my face, Aqua? You're staring at me rather hard.
My name is The Queen of Hearts, defender of love and enforcer of justice! For this game however, you may call me Queenie!

condition.saying: I-is this a game, or a trial? You keep talking about justice like we did something wrong.

case.state: Of course you did something wrong! By playing you're opposing me, the true avatar of justice, aren't you?

condition.saying: I-I don't think I like hearing an Earth girl go on and on about justice and evil the minute I meet her. Are you trying to decide who's "good" or not?

case.state: Well Jura, I don't really need to try to decide... After all, you must be evil if you're opposing me, the true avatar of justice!

condition.saying: There's no good or evil here, sister. The only justice is the Holy Ass.

case.state: Hmph! As if a loudmouthed villain like you'd know anything about the presence of good and evil! And if that's your source of justice, you're probably just another dumb cultist come to ruin everyone's day!

condition.saying: You sound like every two-bit Templar who says they're gonna purge Roanapur of sin. It's always a week tops before they end up in a meat cooler. Just chill out and jill off.

case.state: Hmph! I can assure you I'm much better at beating evil than a band of zealots! Besides, what would a filthy villain know about the power of good, anyway? How hard it hurts when a bolt of magic sears part of your face?
Hey! I'm the perfect example of justice! And I'll have you know I lost my fingers by-!... Uh... I can't really remember how, but I'm sure it was for a good cause! Love takes sacrifice, you know!

Sort of, Aqua, The Queen of Hearts is just my magical girl title! I'm also known as The Magical Girl of Love, the True Avatar of Justice, O-01-04 in the facility for some reason... But my real name is Queen, or Queenie for short!

Of course I do! I have the power to cleanse the wickedness from all the hearts of the world, leaving them full of naught but love! Usually I have to whack or beam whoever I want to purify a few times, but peace requires action!

What do you mean? Obviously my heart is full of whatever this light is, I'm a hero after all! You're definitely seeing it wrong... Maybe there's still some monster blood stuck on me that's throwing your weird magic senses off...
Country? What's a country? Do you mean a kingdom? Because I'm in charge of protecting one of those!
Tremble before my righteous power, and prepare to lo-!... Eh!? I lost already?
Well, it wouldn't be very heroic of me to crush you all without a fighting chance!
Finally! I was afraid you'd all be gone before I started!
Took you all long enough, I'm not even armed!
I'm not exactly thrilled by that early showing, but the fight is still young!
How cute! I think you all actually tried that time!
Hmm? I have to strip again? Finally! Took you weaklings long enough!
Oh? Is someone finally taking a stand?
Really? It took you all this long?
You must all be desperate, ganging up on me! Very well then!
We've all waited long enough for this. Why even hesitate?
I'm not to be outdone! Stand aside and watch me!
Everyone's layers are all nice and balanced... Wonderful!
With the magic in my soul and the love in my heart, I shall never falter!
I'm not losing, I'm just postponing victory!
Maybe my bodice next? No, I don't believe any of you have earned it quite yet.
How humble of me, giving you all a fighting chance!
Why wouldn't anyone be excited about stripping! It's so much fun!
Attention is nothing new to me, but it's never been quite so... Charged?
Ohh noooo, I'm "beaten". Whatever shall I do? I know!
I'm magical and amazing. What hope do you all have to compare?
No time for shock. I need to get straight to it! This outfit is complex, you know!
Are you trying to scare me off with an early blow? Ha! Justice never backs down!
Stripping so early won't scare me! Just watch!
Should I be bothered by my position?... Nah, it'll work out fine! It always does.
Bit of a tough spot... Good thing I'm tougher!
This game won't shape up well if I keep at it like this... Eh, that just means I get an even better chance to show off why I'm the best magical girl!
Good will always pull through in the end, no need to worry!
Eh? Since when did I have so little left?
I wasn't expecting to fall out of favor so harshly! Do all of you hate me for some reason?
No... no! I'm not just going to let myself fade away!
Guess it's up to me to be the brave one. It always is.
No one wants to be the brave one? Fine, I'll do it then! But you all better follow suit!
Oop, almost forgot to take off my shoes! Wouldn't want to be impolite!
Normally, my skirt would never separate from my bodice. But with a little force and magic, anything is possible!
I'm sure I won't need my staff here! Nobody seems to be in imminent danger.
Come to me magic, serve in the name of love~!
Aaand now for the strings~!
...My outfit doesn't have that many parts, doesn't it? I'll have to be more careful!
It's a nightmare keeping my shoes clean, with all the blood and muck I have to trudge through. Floating makes it easier, but when the monster knows how to shoot goop... Blech!
Tada! Wonderful, aren't I?
Ehe! I've never used magic for that before! How was it?
Tada! See, you can hardly tell there was another piece to begin with!
It's not like any injury could ever bother me. In fact, conflict is what makes an encounter interesting! So all of you try your best, ok!
...I feel I could've taken something else off instead of my underwear, but what? I can't think of anything off the top of my head.
Should I have kept my panties..? No, I'm already so close, I might as well have taken them off...
Now, through the power vested in me, I shall have us all partake in the wonders of love!
Hopefully my staff doesn't fly off too far... It has a habit of being stolen by people thinking that a random floating weapon will give them magic powers.
Weak baddies like you are no match for me!
That's what you get for fighting a hero!
Your loss is for the best, ~name~! Someone has to keep everything moving!
Hmmm... Yep, it's your loss, ~name~!
No one gets anywhere by giving up! Never stop trying and failing, ~name~!
Let's look past victory and instead right at ~name~! Come on, don't leave us waiting!
Being happy with what you have is only a small part of life. The important piece is getting stronger once you lose it!
Risk changes the whole experience. Now that I've lost a bit, winning just feels so much more exciting!
Luck is such a measly excuse. Now awe, there's a real reason for your loss!
Don't whine, try and lose with dignity!... Oh, right. Stripping. Nevermind.
I wish more villains tried to fight with a card game; less people would get hurt.
Join me, ~name~! Let both of us share this experience with one another!
Haaa... Holding on this close to the end just makes me more excited...
Why don't you balance the playing field this round, ~name~? There's quite a big divide, but I'm sure you could fill it.
Ready to show off? Maybe something big this time?
Well? Are you planning to join me soon?
Please... Something big!
Come on, ~name~! Show us how brave you can be!
I'm a bit... preoccupied, so it's up to you to make some good choices, ~name~. You can do it, I believe in you!
Don't mind me, it's your turn to go, ~name~!
I assumed after once I was done the game would just end... I'm the only hero after all.
Might as well sweep up you stragglers!
Better late than never! That's what an agent told me once before dashing off to catch a train!
I have to admit, you're pretty good at this! Still, skill isn't going to save you from justice!
Don't feel bad, ~name~! You lost the moment you went against the power of love!
I shouldn't celebrate too much. A victory means nothing when over an impotent opponent.
A hero to protect you and friendly people all around, what's there to be nervous about?
I'm good. You're facing me, so you must be evil. That's reason enough for you not to complain!
Surrender, ~name~!... No wait, don't surrender! I'm not done!
Strip in the name of love~!
Stay calm, ~name~! With me watching, nothing will dare try and embarrass you!
Isn't this game so much fun? I'm hardly even trying and still loving it!
What's ~name~ planned next? I can hardly wait to see!
Victory comes naturally for heroes such as myself! No foe has any chance ever change that!
You can never give up so long as I don't! If not, then who would we face?
Persistence should be rewarded; both yours, and mine!
Well? Don't choose now to be a coward, ~name~!
In case you somehow haven't figured it out yet, having a bad hand makes you lose.
I doubt you'll be able to match my showing... But it wouldn't hurt to try.
Balance is important, right? So why don't you join me in harmony?
~name~ now? Yes!
You can do it, ~name~! Keep losing!
You already have such a great figure, ~name~... It's beyond imagination how much nicer it would look without clothes to ruffle it.
There's always the next hand, and once it comes you can lose again and again and again, ~name~!
I'm finished... but you still aren't? Huh?
Now I'm a bit more focused, being out of the game feels so dull... At least I was doing something during the forfeit.
I could leave now I'm done, but then I wouldn't get to see what happens to ~name~!
I don't think perfect "balance" is going to help me or anyone else right now.
...Nobody lost? How does that happen?
But they-! The cards were-! Whaa?
He's using his mustache to pull in-!... I think that's a minion?
Why didn't you take that off sooner? Think of all the shame it could have saved you from!
I'd assumed you forgot about that. Good on you for remembering, I guess.
You saved ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~..? But... Why?
Aww, now you won't be able to- Huh? What are you reaching for?
Oh! I thought this last round would have finished you off!
I was wondering if you'd ever take that off!
Huh? But why save it till now?
Oh, guess you'll be holding on a bit longer than I thought.
Are you teasing me? It's a decent attempt, I guess...
But why? Why take it off now, or remove it at all?
Nothing to worry about, love takes time!
So pretty! ~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ almost ~clothing.ifPlural(seem|seems)~ enchanted!
Sometimes people come into my room absolutely smothered in little trinkets. You remind me of them, ~name~.
Losing an accessory isn't that bad! Look, I've done it too!
...Wait... Didn't you already take off your ~clothing~ earlier? Maybe I remembered it wrong...
You can strip with more passion than that! Come on, flick your wrists! Strike us a pose!
Is my effort worth that little? Barely measuring to ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~?
A hero wondrous as me, being utterly humiliated by the likes of ~name~...
...Fate has a cruel sense of humor.
Booo! You could at least try and pretend you're losing!
Oh... I guess it was foolish of me to expect generosity from a villain.
...Are you serious? This is what happens when I'm not able to keep people like ~name~ in check!
Boooooo! Boooooooo!
You still have something small left!?
Oh... only your ~clothing~... Callousness is to be expected from a villain, I guess.

state.text: Yeah, yeah, it's just a henchman... Well, if Bobobo's still hiding like a villain, he'll still fall like one!

case.state: Lot of good holding onto your ~clothing~ did you.
And it's not even like I'll be seeing anything new. What a pointless strategy!
What else are you hiding from the game, ~name~? Nothing interesting, it seems.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ could have been used to build up a little more tension you know... Oh well, at least it got you another chance.
That choice was... Smart? Dumb? Evil?... I'm hoping for smart!
You're full of surprises, aren't you, ~name~!
I don't mind you kept your ~clothing~... Not like it was hiding anything important.
At least I can look at the rest of you, ~name~.
Well, you were still exposed before that; might as well enjoy what I can already see.
Maybe lose a liiiitle more? Please?
Even if not much changed with ~name~, at least they're still just as naked!
No reason to shy away, let's get going, ~name~!
~Name~ must be pretty powerful! I can hardly wait to see them in their full!
You still look handsome without your ~clothing~, ~name~! Don't worry!
Patience is a virtue, one a righteous hero such as myself will partake in!
What is success without struggle?
Onto the next hand please!
The evil would have usually revealed itself by now.
...My shoulders feel cold.
...Peace is getting tired of this.
How selfish of you, leaving me like this without any help!
We're both getting nowhere like this...
What's the point even? You might as well have not stripped at all to at least spare my focus.
I'd be more upset if I hadn't already figured out this game was rigged against me.
Why am I not surprised! Oh, right, it's because you're cruel, ~name~!
Aren't villains supposed to try and show up the hero? Why aren't you?
Watch out! The thing is transforming into!... A small girl?
Oh great. Turns out I'm stuck watching your pitiful struggling for even longer.
Did you really keep your..? You did, didn't you!
You're still going? But how! I thought- Ohh, your ~clothing~!
Huh? That counts?
Oh! I'd forgotten about your ~clothing~!
You... Saved that..?
...Whu? You had ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~ still?
I almost believed your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ going to stay... Such a shame, they complemented your body nicely.
O-okay? But wouldn't it be nicer to get to the forfeit?
Aww, but can't you just keep your ~clothing~ and finally lose for good?
I hope your ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ too important, I'd hate it if something bad were to happen!
Progress is progress! No need to get upset over small stuff!
Could I offer you a hair clip? It would be a vibrant addition alongside your ~clothing~!
Only your ~clothing~? Ok!
So pretty! It's like your own personal sparkle!
Have I seen that kind of accessory before? Maybe King had one in her closet...
Stripping's no fun alone...
What's the point if I'm the only one losing? Isn't this supposed to be intimate?
What did I do wrong? Actually, what did you do wrong?
Wait, that's it?! This is why villains don't deserve mercy!
Did you do that to get back at me for something? Ha! Like I'd do something evil to anyone!
Oh. Booo..
I'd whack you with my staff if it hadn't run off!... Wait a minute... Aha! You sabotaged it, didn't you ~name~! That's why it won't return to me!
You're boring, and infuriating! I didn't even know someone could be the two at once!
Great job to the rest of you. This is what happens when you leave a goon to do a hero's job!
Oh! Your head can come off!... Well, at least it doesn't explode! It's hard to save people if their parts are splattered everywhere.
...Huh... I was hoping for something worse...
You could've taken that off while still decent, you know. Was this some manner of perverse plan?
But... Why keep it till now? Why not take it off earlier?
Was their weakness a trick? No, I'm to focused to be deceived! ~name~ must have simply forgotten her ~clothing~ existed, even while wearing it.
Sentiment doesn't help you win a fight.
I'm sure whoever gave you that is very happy you kept it for so long. You know who isn't happy? Me!
All this means is we get to keep seeing the best part...
Hmm, I guess what matters is that plan lets ~name~ keep going!
Nothing changed... That's not so bad!
Not like it covered much anyway...
No more small bits, right ~name~?
How do I know you don't have any more small things saved or hidden away? You could still be wearing!... Umm... Fake nails, maybe? Are you wearing those, ~name~?

state.text: You're trying your best ~name~, we can all appreciate that!
Don't feel bad about taking off something small ~name~, I know I still like you!

case.state: Good, peaceful, and beautiful. I loved it!
Small things can have much more meaning outside of size, it just takes some strength to unlock it!
I'm sure you're fine ~name~. It was hardly a scratch.
Strip more next time! Rewards should rise to stakes, right?
What's the point of playing? ~Name~ keeps fleeing from my purpose.
The game's fair, just not in the right way.
I may be the magical girl of love, but it's also a two-person experience! Stop falling behind!
How ungrateful, even when I go through so much to bring you my love!
Very nice. I'm sure whatever moronic henchman you have skulking in the shadows is dying to kiss your feet after that show of wit, ~name~.
At least I'm still here to put on an actual show.
I hate your injustice. I hate it so much!
It shouldn't have played out like this...
Ohh, why can't I do anything anymore? I'd have ~name~ finished in less than 10 seconds if this place would just let me at them!
Come on! The faster we start, the sooner you can lose again!
Only by burning away wickedness can anyone be born anew!
~clothing.ifPlural(Do|Does)~ your ~clothing~ make you stronger? My clothes may be enchanted, but all that power still comes from the heart!
Minions go first! The villain can come later!
That's a smart choice, ~name~; smarter than a lot of other villains I've defeated at least.
Begone, foul ~clothing~~!
~name~ isn't just taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~, they're building emotion!
I'm sure you don't need ~clothing.ifPlural(|that)~ ~clothing~ anymore!
Banished by the passion of love~!
The big things will wait till later. We can even deal with them together!
Sigh... Why even bother if I'm not bringing someone else into the love?
Really? We've come so far for only your ~clothing~?... Why not something bigger?
Too slow... This should have happened before I got naked.
Regular hero work seems a lot more appealing than ~name~ right now.
Finally decided to try and catch up? I'd have been less flexible if I knew you'd play this slow.
Aww, don't be a coward ~name~! What's life without risk?
Oh! Just your ~clothing~, huh?
Don't you think you could afford to be a little adventurous, ~name~?
What's wrong ~name~? Don't you want to join me?
I don't bite, ~name~; no need to draw back!
Of course you've still got your ~clothing~! This game was rigged against me, after all!
Now you can finally reveal yourse-!... Hey! Why are you only taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~!
No mercy, huh?
I'll hold off on using my full power! No sense in ending this so soon, right?

state.text: Don't you just feel so much lighter?

case.state: There's still time to prove yourself an able player, as well as an appealing one!
I know it might seem hard when up against such an amazing magical girl, but stay calm and keep going!
Remember how brave you can be! Even my heroic righteousness has you hardly deterred, unlike some of my formerly-faced villains!
We're all doing our best, right?
I just have to burrow even further beneath your surface!
Keep going!... Oh, you've already removed enough, ~name~. I just wanted to continue playing!
Not just yet, but soon! I promise!
It's nice to face an opponent who doesn't surrender or perish immediately.
It's always enough, why can't it ever be more!
Come on now, don't run from justice.
Are you cheating? An injustice would justify retribution.
I'm not angry. I'm justified!
If everyone's done gawking at that incredible choice of removal, I'd like to start the next round please!
Normally I'd be dismayed by something so small, but-... Hah... Even with so much still on, ~name~, I can't help but enjoy the sight of you!
Balance will have to wait a little bit longer.
Are you teasing me, ~name~? I won't feel too bad, if you are...
Even the idea alone of you getting closer to me is so good...
Speed it up a little, ok? Not just for my sake, but your pleasure as well!
~Name~ might actually make it out decent. That would be a shame.
Bravery isn't a given, but I still hoped at least my performance would inspire you.
I've prosecuted shoplifters with more flair than you.
Aha! I knew I was right in coming here to seek creatures of evil!
I've never seen ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~ quite like that. Most people back at the facility just wear plain suits.
Oooh, ~clothing.ifPlural(those are some|that's a)~ lovely ~clothing~... ~clothing.ifPlural(Are they|Is it)~ magic?
Forfeit your ~clothing~ to justice!
Hmm... Your ~clothing~ could use a bit more flair! Have you tried shining it?
Sooo... How often do you do this, ~name~?
Are you taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off because of me? Awww, thanks!
Bigger and bigger pieces fall, till we reach your final defense!
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ won't save you from nudity, now or ever again!
What ~clothing.ifPlural(|an)~ adorable ~clothing~! But cuteness won't stop justice!
Come on! This isn't the time for modesty!
Are you afraid of getting closer? Why would that be?
Closer, but not close enough. What's stopping you? Fear?
That hardly seems fair. What happened to our balance?
Oh, how exciting, ~name~ is taking off their ~clothing~! This is the most interesting thing that's happened all ~background.time()~
Do you have no sense of justice whatsoever? I know you've seen my condition, with all those vile glances of yours!
Aww, do you not want to take part? Why?
Oh? Can't you spare a bit more in tribute to your protector?
It's something... Not much, but something.
Just your ~clothing~? Aww, why now of all times to pick so little, ~name~?
This isn't exactly paying my sacrifice forward...
Oh yes, don't get naked, because this game is all about being modest.
Heroes don't deserve to be taunted like this!
So compassionate.
So is it a key? A blade? Both? What kind of stuff does it unlock?
Behind you, Sayaka! Kill the thing before it ru-!... Too late, it flew off. Sigh, I could have blasted it to dust if you weren't standing in the way.

state.text: ...Well, you're lucky I'm trying something different this time, monster. Normally I'd blast you to ash with magic, but instead I'll pacify you with the purity of love and cards! Prepare yourself!

case.state: King's tricks never seem to fail! I wonder if she knew I'd do something like this when she taught me.
You can only throw so many goons at me before I break through!
Are you prettier with or without ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~?... Hmm...
Wonderful, ~name~! But now it's time to get going again.
Hardly any difference... For now!
So cute! I just want to coil my arms around your body and squeeze it forever!
Aha! If I keep playing the same way, I'll keep winning! Now I'll just... um.. remember what I did...
Mm! I'll be hoping for even more from you soon, ~name~!
I'm doing great! You're doing great! We're all doing great!
Your doom fast approaches, cruel temptress ~name~!
Why is it playing out like this, didn't I do well?
Do you at least feel safe under all those layers?
There might be hope for balance still... No reason for me to stop either.
Don't I deserve better? It's not like ~name~ goes around saving people from evil.
I'll just stand here then, all alone.
Oh well... It's hard to stay upset when I'm like this.
Balance will come eventually... What's a little longer to someone virtuous as me?
Maybe next time I'll coax something good out of you, ~name~.
You'll join me yet,~name~! Just wait, someone is going to strike you down in place of me!
So sloooow! Pick up the pace, or else love is going to finish without you!
Am I simply not strong enough to beat this evil?... No, no it's all ~name~'s fault.
Just give up already! This can't be fun for us! Or you!
Ugh... Evil speeches might be just as drawn out, but at least they're gripping.
Oh calm down, it's just magic fire! Unless you're worried about revealing your identity, for some reason.
You're onto your ~clothing~? Already?
Magical girls aren't really in charge of facing petty criminals.
Conflict is the greater half of a meaningful experience. That said, there's not much being gained from this...
Sigh. Hardly a challenge.
How long is this going to take?
Don't stop stripping, ~name~! Surrender means death!
Nudity isn't common for heroes of justice... That doesn't mean it's bad! Just new.
Is the nudity getting to you? Just stay calm, and remember that panicking will make things way worst!
My heart's thumping like a drum this is so thrilling!
This is a lovely game, wouldn't you agree?
Don't be shy! We'd all love for you to join me, ~name~!
Plucked up the courage to try and join me, have you, ~name~?
O-oh, finally something big!
Balance is still a ways off, but that doesn't mean I have to wait to enjoy it!
Running isn't allowed! I might not be playing anymore, but that doesn't mean I can't still stop cowards from trying anything!
Come ooooon, take it off faster! There's already been too much stalling!
The anticipation would be killing me if I wasn't so magical! Hurry it up!
You are still trying, right? It'd make everything dull otherwise.
...Maybe we'll never find our passion.
Please don't just lay there and take it, reciprocate a little!
Isn't this exciting? We're both so close!
This game isn't that hard, I haven't even lost my shoes ye-!...Wait...
Your skin is positively glistening with power! Or sweat! But it's probably magic!
Wow... I never realized love could come this far.
I think I saw your cheeks turn pink! That must mean I'm doing the right thing!
My skirt's gone, so why do I still feel so fuzzy?
How... haaah... Inspiring!
What a show this is! Me pleasuring myself, with ~name~ soon to join me!
Hehe... With how much you've helped me, you'd make a great sidekick, ~name~!
Hmm... How much more can you last? Not long, looking at you now!
Aww, don't stop now; There's still so much left to do!
Even if I'm out, it's not too late to enjoy this.
Just two losses for you to de-transform? Jeez, Ladybug. Don't you know magical girls are supposed to give everything their all?
But how did you already-!... I... Okay...
~Name~ feels... distant.
But who will keep me company? Battles can't be fought with oneself!
I'll keep you safe, ~name~! Nothing you expose can ever come to harm under my protection!
How could anyone not love you, ~name~!
Is it true people pay for this? Why? What's the point then?
You have underwear, right?.... Maybe I should start wearing something beneath my bodice as well, just in case.
Mm! I don't know about you ~name~, but playing naked feels great!
Not quite equal to my current state, but that's okay! I can't expect every one of your actions to be perfect!
Even if I had to stop playing sooner... At least I get to appreciate you now, ~name~.
Awww, how sweet of you to sacrifice your dignity for me!
Ohh~... How thrilling!
Can't you take it all off instead? I'm nude, so you should be too!
You aren't shy are you?... Of course you aren't! Now keep going!
Wonderful! Amazing! But could you pick up the pace a little!
Well, at least you're not giving the game up entirely... Oh? What's that little familiar floating around you?
Keep going, I guess. No reason to dwell on a fading spirit.
Sorry if I seem disinterested, it's just... None of this feels personal enough to be taken to heart.
Play a little better, ok? I promise we'll both enjoy the game a lot more.
Hehe... It's nice to know that I got your ~clothing~ off in exchange for so little.
Good to see you're still going, ~name~! A weaker person would have surrendered by now.
This game is almost everything I'd hoped it to be...

~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~|A ~clothing~)~ like that make every person underneath them special! That's why I'll never trade my outfit, not even for the world!... Actually, the planet comes before fashion.
You look lovely without your ~clothing~, ~name~!
So alluring... Temptation won't take me so easily, however!
You're doing awful, ~name~! Great job!
V-very hot choice, ~name~, I think I can feel myself- Ah!... Burning up!
Keep losing like this, and maybe you'll be in time to join me, ~name~! Wouldn't that be lovely?
I'll forgive you for stripping late once you lose for good! Now come on ~name~, chop chop!
If you ever play again, you could bring less to wear, It'd save you and all us from this waiting!
Redemption is drawing nearer, ~name~!
Another chest? It's gotten a bit dull by now...
I've always more love to give, especially for things like this!
Everyone's getting so exposed...
The- Ahh! More chests the merrier!
Everyone else is topless, ~name~! Come on and join us!
Well, now you can show us some strength outside of cards!
Hmm? Should I be excited?
Let's see it then. Not like you tried to preserve your dignity.
Matching might be fun, but it isn't always necessary! Let's see how unique you truly are!
What will ~name~ be like? Tough? Squishy?
Some big villains like to show off, but they never go this far before...
Enormous scaled lizards, ravenous wads of flesh, endless waves of evil... ~Name~ might not compare to all that, but he'll still be amazing!
I wonder... Well, I won't have to wonder any more!
Do you have muscles? How strong are you? Can you show me?
Finally coming out of hiding, are you, ~name~?
I've seen villains shirtless but... I-it's hardly the same as this!
You should have gotten shirtless a lot earlier, but I forgive you ~name~!
I'm already finished, I could leave to find and face more evil... Eh, that can wait till ~name~'s done and beaten!
How will your chest look? Hmm, you've been fairly sturdy and confident, probably there'll be quite a bit of muscle!
Don't fight it, there's no opposing the power of love!
Nothing but sticks and skin on you, that's no state to fight in!
Say, how about if you apologize really nicely, I'll let you come seek out some evil with me after this! That might put some muscle on you!
I wouldn't mind getting in a tussle with you...
Was it hard getting toned like that? Because it was worth it!
W-woah...
Well? Aren't you going to pose for us, blessed with muscles like that?
You seem like you'd be good in a brawl, I like that!
So fit... I guess being able to run comfortably doesn't mean you're any speedier elsewhere.
How i-impressive!
All your hard work is paying off very nicely for me, ~name~.
Bit on the slimmer side, are you, ~name~? No problem! You're handsome all the same.
You'd just fall apart if I pressed up against you, isn't that right ~name~?
Pfft! I'm sorry, it's just... You would look so ridiculous in spandex!
S-so strong...
Ah! You look a bit frail, ~name~... Oh well, that's not reason enough to hold back!
Awww, you would fit perfectly in an outfit just like mine! I bet you'd hardly even notice the bodice!
I wish I could get muscles like that... Magic has trouble stopping fists from flying into your face.
Sigh... Having such a powerful figure would be amazing. King might even let me borrow her gauntlets.
~Name~ isn't done yet. Still a few pieces to fight with.
...I don't know what I was expecting.
How's this different from seeing an arm or leg? What makes your body special?
It's nice, I guess. Could be nicer.
Whoa. I didn't expect it to be so... shaped!
How couldn't anyone love such a heroic figure!
Interesting... I can almost see your body in action like that!
Maybe I'll come down to your level soon... If you don't give up, that is!
I've only ever held someone close to me clothed... Maybe I should try it nude instead.
Strike a pose , ~name~! Show us how proud you are of your body!
Rather freeing, isn't it?
Do you think you're handsome, ~name~? I do...
V-very nice...
H-how heroic of you, showing up just in time to help someone in need.
What a show!
N-not done... Till everything comes off you!
This was almost worth the wait!
I only need a moment to enjoy you like this, there's more to come still, remember?
Such a thrilling view!
No matter your physique, you're never safe from me, ~name~! I could just wriggle a small, pink bolt of love past all those muscles and riiiiight into your heart!
This might be what I came here for, but it isn't exactly what I wanted.
I'm never going to learn anything like this. ~Name~ is almost out already!
Wha? Is ~name~ revealing something? I lost my focus for a moment.
I'm not angry at you, ~name~, just bored. Bored and disappointed.
And now the serpent can come crawling out of the grass!
Fwoo... Ok, I'm ready to see it!
I've got to focus hard on ~name~... I might never get another chance to see this.
What was the picture like again? Will ~name~ be the same?
How big will it be..? Hmm...
I've never seen a real penis till now... You should feel honored to assist a hero righteous as me!
You... "make love" with a penis, right? How different is that from regular affection?
Getting naked with ~name~... That doesn't sound too bad.
Just show me already! I've done and waited more than enough to get here!
Now ~name~, let's all see you in your nude, pure glory!
Take it out! Let's see what you're made of!
Come out, you phallic monster...
Getting you here was so sloooow! Hopefully it was worth it!
Surrender the last of your dignity! Then we can all start thinking about you forfeiting something else, ~name~.
Good, good! Seems you're not selfish enough to flee with our share of the spoils!
I may be finished, but not you! Chop chop!
...Isn't it supposed to be bigger?
This is supposed to be captivating?... Why?
As a magical girl, I tend not to bother with miniscule evils. If it can't hold itself up against me, then why not let someone weaker defeat it instead?
You can't even keep my attention with cards, what makes your penis any more captivating?
No need to prove anything, even if you're small we all still love you!
Should I judge you? I don't know if that size is good or not...
Cute!
It's... uh... a bit smaller than I imagined.
Awww, it's so adorable!
Small isn't bad! There's plenty of great tiny things; Like candy, or stars!
Nobody should ever underestimate minor evils, they're the ones with the most motivation.
Does the size matter? It still seems perfectly there...
It's smaller than my palm... Maybe even my fingers, as well? Move closer for a second, ~name~, let me get my hand closer to compare.
Tiny...
Just your penis being there is enough for me.
Evil is evil, and I'll love beating it all the same.
Oh, is your size why you tried so hard to stay decent? Seems like a dumb reason, to me...
Ehe! So tiny!
The size would make it easy to hide... Not that you will, right ~name~?
Not a lot to see... Well, what comes after the reveal is what matters!
That's it? I guess it looks nice...
Maybe I should stick to fighting evil.
Sigh...
Nothing left for ~name~ to show. Might as well finish them off.
So that's what it looks like! Your penis suits you, ~name~!
Still so much we can do...
...I kind of want to poke it.
This is a whole other kind of reward...
Phew... I had to fight hard to see this.
So what now? How do you use it?
It's kind of like a serpent, with it's width, the head, and the... the... haaaaahhh! I don't want to look at it anymore!
The nudity's nice... But I'm more curious about the process.
What a shameful piece of you, ~name~. Maybe it's time for you to "repent".
Ehe... Nice staff, ~name~!
Aww, already getting excited, ~name~?
H-hot-!
So excited!... I wonder why?
I can't wait to see you wield that staff in a bit...
Pleasure is just one misstep away!
Was it worth the wait? I-... Well, I'm not actually sure, it's not really that special looking.
Such a brute. Force can't get you anywhere in a game like this.
What marks the difference between pride and dignity?
It's kinda interesting, I guess.
Kind of impressive they can get that big... Then again, so can fairies.
Is that even safe? I don't exactly know how one would use a penis, but surely yours is too large!
B-big monster!... Wait, I've beaten those before, what am I worried about?
What kind of spell let you hide something like that? I couldn't even guess about it while you were dressed!
It looks so...thick!
S-so big...
W-well, the size of an enemy has never stopped me before!
Could you even hold on to something that large?
I-I thought I was ready! Why is it do big!?
W-what a beast!
My staff is fairly big but... It could hardly prepare me to ever hold that!
It's almost magical, how large your penis is!
Ohh, so that's why you've been so brave about this!
Size means power, at least for monsters. You're a villain, but are you a monster, ~name~? It has been difficult to beat you down...
Ehe! This was something worth fighting for!
It almost doesn't feel real how large it is... Did you enchant it to make it bigger?
What can you even do with that? It seems to heavy for a regular person to even hold!
Gasp! You can strip with magic too?! Magical girls and magical swords aren't that different, it seems!
Do I bother looking? Might as well, ~name~'s already there after all.
A-already..?
What's the point if I can't join?
Watching from the sidelines, hardly even once brought into the fight. And now ~name~ is getting their chest out. Why did I even bother coming?
Bam! Now sacrifice your dignity for the greatest of goods!
Peace after victory feels great! People are frolicking, life is thriving... Though I'll gladly accept your chest as a reward instead!
Nothing to fear! Love is natural, especially for breasts!
Aww, but your breasts were so charming just nestled up there!
King told me she never used a bra because they were too tight. Maybe they were only irritating for her?
I never knew how liberating this could be!
Hurry up, ~name~! The spotlight's big enough for everyone!
I won't turn down a companion, but don't think you can usurp me!
I hope your clothing isn't as tight as mine was... My skin still stings a little, especially with how hot my body is.
A topless ~name~? That would help me out quite a bit.
It's not a crime to help a hero, don't be scared!
Just come quietly, there's no escaping fate!
I'm hoping for the best from you! Let's see how you shape up!
Nervous? I hope so!
Shame on you, making us wait this long! And shame on you for your villainous spirit! And even more shame for what you're doing!
Of course, your body will be perfectly acceptable no matter the form! Evil is shapeless, after all!
Why did I come here? I'm sure it wasn't for those...

They're just like mine. But what makes them interesting?
So tiny! How couldn't anyone love them!
Oh, that's your actual size... I thought your clothes were just a bit tight.
Soft and tiny, like little puppies! {small}... Oooh, one day that two-faced mutt will show itself.{!reset}
Don't be ashamed! There's not even that much to look at anyway!
Your breasts, your nipples, your chest... Everything about you is just so adorable, ~name~!
There's less to hold, but never less to love!
The size might make it easy, but please don't hide your breasts, ~name~! They're just so amazing!
Awww, you look so vulnerable!
Ehe! So cute!
A lot can be done with little bursts of magic, and luckily for you I know juuust how to tease out that potential!
Having our breasts match isn't balance enough, lose again already!
Still not close to being my equal, ~name~... Buuut, if you keep at it like this, then maybe~!
Your breasts are so small I can see it; The thumping of your heart!
Nothing of much substance, like most miniscule evils!
Smaller than me... But does that really mean anything bad?

...They look normal. Can we move on now?
Nothing special whatsoever.
When the game started, I thought you would be special, exciting!... Guess I was wrong.
...I like mine more.
Such soft skin... Giving you a hug must feel super comfy!
I'll continue in a bit! Just let me... S-so compelling...
They look so...so!... I-I can't find words that do your breasts justice...
Don't give up yet, there's still so much for me to see!
They really just pop out, don't they!
Just barely behind ~name~. Maybe if I do something special...
V-very nice...
No person of love wouldn't adore your chest, ~name~! Anyone who doesn't is probably a villain in disguise.
N-nice...
You're quite a handful, holding on against me for so long, ~name~.
That was only part one! You've got at least... {small}two, three, four... No, that's too many...{!reset} Aha! Two more steps till we're even!
At least you're one of the pretty evils.
You're pretty well rounded, ~name~! Good with cards and looks!
Ever wonder why breasts are so wonderful? It's because they're so close to the heart and what comes from it! Boobs are like big love balloons!
Size and shape in perfect balance...
Hmm, even if they're absolutely brimming with evil, I have to admit most villains are very attractive.
Form over function, I guess...
Full as a heart, but sharp as a clover.
...Why are we watching those useless lumps of fat? Is it supposed to be appealing?

You're even larger than the slime! Probably not as squishy, though.

Those look really heavy... I couldn't imagine fighting with that much weight.

Well, no issue with supporting your confidence.
If I lose my balance... Would you mind catching me?
It's nice having something big come out and face me every once in a while.
Beauty is a reflection of your character, and by the looks of it you have a biiiig heart!

There's no hiding those!... {small}Probably no carrying them, either.{!reset}
~Name~ might be late, but at least their mountains won't hurt anyone... Right? No way anyone won't let themselves be smothered!
A little bit of excess never hurt anyone... At least, that's what King told me.
No matter how big your chest is, or how much longer you last, you'll still never stand up against me!

You're still stripping? But what's the point if I'm excluded?

...I won't have anything to do soon...
Are you nervous, ~name~? If it helps, just know at this point I don't really care how naked you get.
Already? I'd hoped you'd last a bit longer...
This seems a bit soon... Oh well, love is unstoppable after all!
Slow down, ~name~! Love's a race you can't finish alone!
I just realized you'll probably face your final loss soon. Aww... There was still so much to discover.
I've waited to see this for so long...
Fwooo! Ok ~name~, I'm ready to handle all your beauty!
Go all the way! Never surrender!
All that's left is your ~clothing~ and you, ~name~... I'd love if you won out.
Is this thanks for my bravery. ~name~? I accept!
Stop with the waiting! We've all done our fair share of it!
Don't pick now to be afraid, you knew this would happen eventually!
How nice of you to show yourself, ~name~.
It's only fair you get naked, right?
You've been trying so hard to avoid this... There's nothing wrong down there, right?
If you'd wanted to spare yourself this embarrassment, you could've lost when I was still playing. Everyone would've been too awed by me to even notice your shame!
Give up this sight to us! Then, if you've still deluded yourself that you can win this, give up!
Sigh. I guess I'll track it down after the game, if it hasn't fled the area already. You look great, by the way. Very alert.
Wouldn't you want to keep at least a little hair to cover yourself?
Well it's there... Not much stopping that.
You didn't even cut it all away; How lazy.
Hmmph! This would be more enjoyable if you put your efforts into beating me instead of a haircut.
Do you not care about keeping your own body decent, ~name~?
Too messy for my liking.
You're even more naked than I thought.

Loving yourself is the first step to being loved by others! It's wonderful to see you care enough to trim!
I can see each strand's points from here... Trimming doesn't normally make it prickly, right?
Your skin is so shiny! Did you do anything to it besides shaving?
Bald is awesome, you get to keep such glossy surfaces!
So soft... So tender.
You're pushing into something else, something past love...
Aww... But I thought your ~clothing~ was the last cover!

This is more of a shakedown than a show...
There's still a little fight left in you, I'm sure!
Such a pretty part of you, ~name~!
Like a gateway to your heart, nestled between two legs!
Justice never forgets... I'm glad that's true.
C-come just a liiittle closer, ~name~, peace is waiting.

Last chance, ~name~; Be sure to waste it~!
Even when it seems hopeless, with no chance of survival, never give up!... That's what I'd say if you weren't evil. Lose! Lose! Lose!
Hmm? Too busy for yourself?
Ehe! Expected to get away without going nude, were you!
Ehe! Nothing to hide, ~name~?
There isn't even any hair to cover it...

You must be so warm, with all that hair and... excitement.
A bit on the wilder side, ~name~? No problem, you'll get to indulge that part of you in a little while!
Oh? Were you sure you'd lose, coming here so bare?
Completely clean and pure... But I'm sure we all know better than to fall for that.
You're pushing into something else, something past love...
Nice to see someone came prepared!

state.text: Magical Sempai? You mean magical, like in magical girl?! Gasp! I wasn't expecting to meet someone like me here! What kind of spells can you do?!
So you've got "magical" in your name... You're also a girl... Gasp! You're a magical girl like me, aren't you! What kind of magic do you use?

case.state: What, you can't bear to look at our faces anymore?
But... Don't you need those to look at stuff? How are you going to struggle if you can't even see your cards!
You can't see without those, can you? Here, how about l take a peek at your hands and read them aloud for you, ~name~!... What do you mean, "that's cheating"? It's helping!
Hey, {b}HEY!{!reset} Don't run you coward! I wasn't through with you yet!... Oh? What's this they dropped?
~Name~ doesn't get to play with us anymore..?
No chances left, ~name~. I wish you had more...
At least you were here, however insignificant your presence was.
You have to do that now? Already?
And now to finish you off!
This was always my favorite part... Prosecution!
Aww, but you were already so handsome! I wish I could savor that beauty just a little longer...
Kneel before the warmth of love!
Do we finally get to see ~name~-! Ooh! Yes!
Stripping, luck, conflict... It was all worth it to reach ~name~'s finale!
Come on, ~name~, we all want to see you!
I get to see ~name~ make love to himself... Haaa...
Well ~name~... Is your weapon ready?
Not so confident now, are you ~name~? You forgot one thing, no one escapes justice!
Finally! I was about to start begging you to join me! Imagine that, a hero pleading with a villain!
Now ~name~ gets to come to the love!
Haha! Now for your just rewa- punishment!
~Name~, ~name~... Did you forget? Evil never wins!
Yes yes yes yes! At last, you're done for, ~name~!
I've had my eye on you especially, ~name~, that incredible will and confidence to push forward... But that all ends now!
A villain can fall, but something else always rises.
Just like that? No final monologue or dramatic explosion?
I've beaten you. and now you have to beat yourself. Such a proliferating forfeit.
This would be nicer on a paper. At least drawings don't run off without you.
Next time against someone so obviously above your power, rely on something other than luck!
You've got your own monster to deal with now.
Have fun, ~name~! Think righteous thoughts!
If I threw a few hands, I could get closer to ~name~... No, absolutely not! What kind of hero loses on purpose!
Huh? Oh, right; The game.
Time to start stroking your-!... Uh... Staff of love!
I guess there's something more important right now than suppressing the rest of you.
You're fine with me watching, aren't you? Why else would you be here?
Feel free to look over at me, it's only fair to share the sight of one another!
Balance at last!... Well, balance with ~name~ at least.
Now repent for all your sins and all our desires!
Fight till and past the climax, ~name~!
You had your chance, and like a true villain you squandered it. Ha!
Get to it, and no hiding, either! You've evaded me far too long to show me nothing!
Enjoy it! You were only brought this pleasure because of me, after all!

Yes, yes; We can all hear how much fun you're having, ~name~.

Good thing you can make yourself happy...

Thanks for giving my body a purpose...
Knight would scream if she found me watching this.

Stroke yourself in the name of love!

Peace for everyone! Isn't it great, ~name~?

Hah... I'm not giving up till you do, ~name~!
Hmm... Maybe I'll help if you tell us all how sorry you are.
Without cards to focus on, I can spare all my attention for ~name~!... Although, I do miss the excitement of thrashing you all at cards.

Put some more effort into it! You'll never redeem yourself like that!
Heroes always have to stay vigilant... We wouldn't want want to lose sight of what we're fighting, would we?
See? Now we're getting somewhere, ehe!

Might as well wrap up, you've only one thing left hidden.

Fight on for just a little longer!

You must be yearning to finish... No harm dragging it out further, though!
Go ahead, ~name~, purge your penis of all it's wickedness!
Why think when I can just enjoy watching ~name~? All the moaning is making that harder anyways.
So fast! That means you're almost done, right?
You've lasted long enough... But why not keep going for a little while?
Don't surrender at the very end, ~name~! See your journey through into it's conclusion!
Aww, but couldn't you do it just a little while longer?
But why can't our bliss last forever?
Ha... Ha... Even if you are, I won't be giving in just yet!
D-don't cum yet! I'm not close enough!
~Name~? ~Name~!... I think it's too late to get them to slow down.
Just let alllll the bad thoughts and plans melt away...
Now it's time for your head to burst! Both of them!
Justice doesn't settle for anything less than total judgment! Let every last bit of evil pour out of you!
People always need a hero to reach the end of their journeys... Do you need me?
Maybe just a graze against you wouldn't be too lenient...
Expungement or excision? Whatever the case, it's outside of you now.
You didn't even need me here to finish, did you!
And now the star falls away forever unto the horizon.
You got what you came here for... I can't say the same.
Your purpose is fulfilled. Now, it's time to fade from our focus.
S-so much came out...
If only you could go again, we'd all continue to watch your love.
That final blow, the closing moments... It's truly an amazing ending, isn't it?
It looks like white sap... I wonder if it shares the taste?
So that goop would normally go... Inside someone?
Aww, why did ~name~ have to finish already...
The climax of your fight! {small}And of my emotions...{!reset}
...Eh, even with you finished, we're still close enough.
W-what a climax!
I-it's so sticky, and hot..!
Love goo... If I wasn't familiar with the deadly kind, I'd probably touch it!
And stay down!
Redemption is at hand!... And on your hand too, I suppose.
Look at how much vile goop you released... I doubt the good in you'd have lasted another week if I hadn't came!
Another villain cleansed of evil! For all my hard work, I deserve a pat on the back!... Not from you though, ~name~. At least, not till you wash your hands.
Bye ~name~, it was fun while you lasted.
Peace restored to yet another foe...
Sure, go pleasure yourself. It's not like someone else wanted to engage with the game.
How evil of you, to deprive me of purpose! If I wasn't so righteous, I'd think you were a villain!
Seeing yourself to the end... There's pride in that! For the side of good, surrender is never an option!
And the hero reigns supreme! Banish yourself into shame, villain!
How exciting for ~name~, and for us!
Love triumphs! Now, bask in it's warmth, ~name~!
It's happening, isn't it! The time for ~name~ to give us a show!
I'm still winning! We all are with this forfeit!
Cease your struggling, foul being! Justice is at hand!
I've been waiting forever for this!
How could you say no to the fast and furious swan boat of love?
Now we can match ~name~!... Well, sort of. I'm still better than you.
Ehe! Feeling ready, ~name~? You have had all game, and my help!
It doesn't matter if I can't get cards; You won't escape justice, ~name~!
No excuses, ~name~! If I had to do it, so do you!
Following in my footsteps, are you? Don't be embarrassed, it's normal to want the incomparable glory of a true hero!
Haha! Retribution!
The first good step to loss is acceptance. Don't you want to be good for us all, ~name~?
{b}She's summoning a pillar! Duck!...{!reset} Oh... It's just to sit on. Phew...
Why is ~name~ starting their forfeit so early? Soon I'll have nothing to do...
Hmph!
Truly your just reward.
I hope you're at least strong enough to make yourself feel something.
Turn yourself just a liiiiitle bit this way and... Perfect! Get going, ~name~!
You chose to come here, ~name~! And you wouldn't want to break the rules, now, wouldn't you?
Do you feel shame? Excitement? Something in-between?
Not quite there yet... This game is still missing something.
Balance at last...
Now banish yourself to shame, clever enchantress!
Hmmm... I guess I could use a sidekick!
J-just get down here already!
If only I could help cleanse you more...
Well? Get to it!
Don't you dare hide, ~name~! We earned this!
Oh? Starting so fast?... I must have been missing out on something amazing.
Like always, the hero's still one step ahead!
Get to it! And don't even bother try showing up my performance; you wouldn't have the flair, or passion!
Face my vengeance from beyond modesty!
Just don't hurt yourself, got it? There's still a lot of "good" left on you I don't want damaged.
You're having your fun, but I'm not really having mine.
Just keep going, I guess...
You seem very comfortable with this, ~name~... That can't be, right? Who would practice losing?
The humiliation of failure... I suppose ~name~ could find pleasure in that.
What of my own pleasure? My own enjoyment!
How shameful of you, selfishly indulging yourself in such a debased manner.
What's ~name~ feeling right now? Hopefully I can learn it...
Let the flames of love burn bright! Can you feel its heat?
Sigh... It's not fair, why can't I focus on both ~name~ and the game at once!
So vulnerable... But I won't let anything bad happen to you!
Love truly reaches into our deepest depths, doesn't it!
W-wow, you're certainly bursting with passion!
Have to keep watching... For your safety of course!
This is normal, ~name~! Intimacy is meant to be shared! What difference does setting make?
Take your time... Some things are meant to be savored.
Are you staring at me?... Well, it only makes sense you'd want to look upon the avatar of love in your moment of passion!
Mmmh! This forfeit lets me relish in my victories for even longer! I wonder why it isn't common?
If it comes down to it, I could probably copy her...
It's not like I'd be losing, right? After all, this is what the game's about!
Building higher and higher, unable to stop till the final movements!
Maybe I'll be joining ~name~ soon... That doesn't sound so bad!
Thinking back to all my crusades of love... Nothing can come even close to the kind of passion this game creates...
It's still a bit unbelievable I'd never known about this kind of love. Oh well, experience is still the greatest teacher!
Pipe down a little, ~name~. I'm trying to focus!... Ohh!
Let's see who can hold out longest...
This is magical, the two of us pleasuring ourselves together...
Hehe...
Y-you're very pretty, ~name~...
I'll never forget about doing this... or doing it with you, ~name~.
Hmm, maybe there's still some good in you yet...

The way everyone else is looking at ~name~... They don't plan on eating her, right?! No, only that big bad wolf does that. I'm sure the others are just enchanted by the performance!... Wait, that could be evil too!
After all this is through, I hope you can finally see the true light of love, ~name~!
I was more enthralling, right everyone? I already know the answer, don't bother speaking up.
I could help... But then I don't think ~name~ will have learned her lesson.
Just do what I did!... Well, get as close as you can to what I did. Stuff varies from person to person, and it's not like you're me, likely much to your disappointment.
Shouldn't you get more tired the longer you go?
S-slow down! Aren't you worried about hurting yourself?
It's getting a lot harder to ignore what you're doing, ~name~... That doesn't make it any more appealing.
Do you feel shameful? It certainly doesn't look that way.
~Name~ seems very determined not to slide into obscurity.
Are you winning in the battle for pleasure? It sounds like it!
Seems this resistance can't hold any longer...
What if you just kept masturbating forever? We'd both never get tired of it, right?
You can do it! Go even faster!
There's bliss existing with a clear goal in mind... But now it's time to finish.
Aww... Why do love and justice always have to be so short lived?
There's bliss existing with a clear goal in mind... But now it's time to finish.
It won't be long now...
Pulse with your heart, follow it to paradise!
Let love course through your entire being!
Is ~name~ really that close? Aww, I wanted to finish together.
D-deliver yourself to love at long last!
I'm glad I could be of help till the end, ~name~!
But how! I-I can hardly keep up with you!
T-till the very end, ~name~!
So beastly... Well, the less civilized villains always did fight the hardest.
Melt into your own loving embrace~...
Best not to disturb her... At least, not if you aren't qualified! HEY! WE BELIEVE IN YOU, ~NAME~!
There's no shame in a little begging, if you're so desperate.
~Name~ seems like they finally have a good handle on themselves... Still, I think a little help wouldn't throw them off.
Moving onwards...
No chances for redemption, just the silent obscurity of a bystander...
Quick to fall, quick to finish...
I'll remember this performance, though with more envy than fondness.
Done so soon? Aww, I was enjoying the show...
Didn't that feel great? Evil could never taste such rich love without my help!
Gah! What made that sound, I was busy looking at my- Oh, ~name~ finished!
No finishing flair? But you could look even better all sparkly!
All good things must come to an end. Sigh, I wish these battles could last forever.
Mmm... I feel tired just looking at you, ~name~. But justice can never rest!
Did you just... Twitch? That performance must have really resonated throughout you!
It's not a particularly romantic finale, but love takes many forms!
T-thank you for your service...
I'll be joining your pleasure soon!
Oooh!
Have you finally accepted the warm embrace of love?
Aaaaand, you're done! Now go forth and live in the name of love~!
You look exhausted, ~name~! Hmm, I think that spot on the floor hasn't been tainted yet, go rest a moment.
And at last, peace returns to ~name~. Ahhh, I love my job!
What a spectacular finale from ~name~! Good enough to enjoy, though not thrilling enough to compare!
I-... Huh? I have to forfeit first?! It wasn't supposed to go like this, heroes are meant to go last!
M-me!? First?! Why not someone else, justice knows they'd deserve it!
Fwoo... Okay! This is what I've been preparing for!
Oh, now me? I would have enjoyed waiting just a bit longer...
Boo... Couldn't I stay with you all balanced here nude forever?
Fine! But to spite you all, I'll make sure I enjoy it! That'll show you harbingers of misery!
Well, I might as well enjoy this!... Not like I have much reason not to.
Just another battle, but one I can fight alone... That sounds nice...
I'll not shy away! In the name of love~!
When was the last time I did this? Actually, have I done this?
The air, my hand, my heart... Aahh, everything's just so warm!
This feels a bit selfish... At least everyone else gets their own turn.
Balance is... Ooohh... hard to keep like this...
Mmm...
Not quite as thrilling as victory but- Ahh! It's getting there!
Oohh, yes~...
I'll never... back down!
This would be a lot better if I had more fingers...
A-almost there!
L-losing balance!
Aah! Just a bit more!
W-watch me-! Please don't look away!
Justice is c-coming!
{big}F-for looooove~!!{!reset}
Huff... Huff... That felt... really good...
Did I lose? Everyone keeps acting like I did... No, no it's all of you who are wrong.
{big}Heeeey! Staaaafff! Come baaaaaack!...{!reset} That's not good, I've no clue where it is, and it's not returning either.
Could I have some cards? Not to play anymore, though! Just to flick into all your gaping faces.
At first I thought it was just a waste of time, but this kind of love is actually kind of nice.
...What's an anti-hero supposed to be? It sounds like the opposite of a hero, but why not just call it a villain then?
Yawn... Mmm, maybe I can afford a quick nap before going back home...
I could've been doing that instead of sitting in the cold rain for villains who'd never come... I could've done that while waiting in the cold rain for villains who would never come!
Hehe... Knight's going to love hearing about all this! I can't wait to see her ecstatic face once I tell her about the game!

The agents must be worried about where I am right now... Eh, they'll be fine without me for a little longer! I propped King's door open so she could get out to fight evil whenever she decides to wake up!
H-hey! All of you stop pretending I'm a loser! I can see how you all look at me, even if you try to hide it!
... I expected to win, but... Maybe I shouldn't have even bothered coming.
...Nobody needs me here anymore...
...I won the the game? Oh... Yaaaaaay...
...Err, would anyone happen to know where I came in from? I can't seem to remember how I got ~background.location~ here...

Yet again, the magical girl of love triumphs over villainy! And with the power of love and justice combined, never again sha-! H-hey! Where's everybody going? Don't leave yet, I wasn't done with my speech!
You're all just going to leave? Hmmph! No thanks for your savior, I see!
What can I say, victory just comes naturally for the greatest magical girl to ever grace the world's heart~.
Was there every any doubt? Not from me, and certainly never again from all of you!
Aww, don't look so ashamed everyone! I'm sure whenever you play your next game together, you'll all be failures instead of embarrassments!
Poor ~name~, still so full of corruption... Say, if you want, I could... finish you off. How's that sound, ~name~?
Oh well... Usually if it's only one survivor they don't come back to bite you.
Don't think I'll forget this humiliation so easily! One day soon, I'll come back to bring you your righteous reward, you, you-!... What was your name again?
